text: For <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> analysis on the protein level , 1 x 106 <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - cells were lysed and loaded next to a protein-mass ladder ( Magicmark , Invitrogen ) on a NuPAGE 4-12 % bis-tris gel ( Invitrogen ) .
The proteins were electroblotted onto a PVDF membrane ( Amersham Life Science ) .

Unspecific binding was blocked with BSA , and the membranes were subsequently incubated with an 1 : 200 dilution of goat anti - <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in blocking buffer ( Abcam ) overnight at 4 degreesC .
The blots were developed using an anti-goat HRP-labeled mAb ( Amersham Biosciences ) and visualized with a LAS 1000 camera ( Fuji ) .
Membranes were incubated in stripping buffer and re - blocked for 1 h .

The membranes were re-probed using anti - <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( HG3-31 ; Santa Cruz Biotechnology ) , anti - <extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 4B10 , Santa Cruz Biotechnology ) , anti - <extra_id_0> GAPDH <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 6C5 , Ambion ) , anti - phospho - <extra_id_0> SMAD2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 138D4 ) , anti - phospho - <extra_id_0> STAT6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 5A4 ) , and anti - <extra_id_0> STAT6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Cell Signaling Technology ) ,
